profile.author: Christopher Tan
profile.desc:
Mr. Christopher Tan CFP®, MBA (Chief Executive Officer), has close to two decades of experience in the wealth management and financial planning industry.

Christopher has also spoken on financial planning issues to hundreds of entities, both local and overseas, including at the CFA Institute Annual Conference held in Singapore.

In 2014, he was appointed by the Singapore Government to be part of the CPF Advisory Panel.

Christopher also holds a Master of Business Administration Degree from University of Warwick, which has one of the top business schools in the world.
